item.title: 1. BRBBOT - In depth analysis
item.description: Sample: F47060D0F7DE5EE651878EB18DD2D24B5003BDB03EF4F49879F448F05034A21E This is a fairly simple malware sample that can be a great start for beginners in Malware Analysis! As it combines different kinds of techniques and at the same time a simple implementation, So let’s start digging into it! ðŸ”¥. Extracting Strings I prefer always to start by viewing the strings as it gives me a general insight on what this sample is doing the information we get from this screenshot is that:
